name: Kill Something
description:
Kill Something by Team Something is a side-scrolling action game featuring 2.5D hack-and-slash gameplay where the player is tasked with surviving against waves of enemies leading up to a challenging boss fight. The game is set in a fantasy world with an artstyle reminiscent of our biggest inspiration castle crashers.

  Play as an adventurer in the business to, well, kill something. No captured princess. No revenge plot. Dude knows what he wants. 

  Advance through desert and swamp environments hacking down hordes of menacing snakes as you fight to survive on your quest for pest control.

  Challenge yourself in the final boss fight against a swampy behemoth as you evade attacks in a desperate encounter to kill or be killed.

Kill Something is our first game created as a team and was made in 7 weeks on Unity, being still in early development.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • J - Attack
